text: Jim B. Tucker is medical director of the Child and Family Psychiatric Clinic, and associate professor at the Division of Perceptual Studies, at the University of Virginia. His main research interests are reincarnation research, and prenatal and birth memories.Division of perceptual studies - Staff University of Virginia Tucker, a child psychiatrist, worked for several years on this research with Ian Stevenson before taking over upon Stevenson’s retirement in 2002. Tucker is the author of Life Before Life: A Scientific Investigation of Children’s Memories of Previous Lives.Division of Perceptual Studies University of Virginia He has been interviewed about reincarnation in print and broadcast media in the United States, United Kingdom, and Canada. ==Related pages== * Jane Roberts ==References== == Other websites == * Official website Category:American parapsychologists Category:Living people Category:University of Virginia faculty Category:1960 births Category:American psychologists
